short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Produce iCalendar file from Student Schedule on GT's Oscar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds a "Download calendar" button onto Georgia Tech's Oscar Student Schedule page which can be used to add the student's classes for the semester onto their calendar app of choice (e.g. Google Calendar, etc)
